Sentencas: Fe-Cr ferritic alloys are applied for interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) operated at around medium temperatures.
Titulo: Improvement of Oxidation Resistance of Fe-Cr Ferritic Alloy Sheets for SOFC Interconnects

Sentencas: The oxidation behavior of sheets with various thicknesses of Fe-22%Cr ferritic alloy, ZMG232L, was investigated.
Titulo: Improvement of Oxidation Resistance of Fe-Cr Ferritic Alloy Sheets for SOFC Interconnects
Improvement of Oxidation Resistance of Fe-Cr Ferritic Alloy Sheets for SOFC Interconnects

Sentencas: rate of thin sheet was much higher than that of thick one because Cr content decreased under oxide layer of edge part of thin sheet therefore Cr oxide became unstable and Fe was mainly oxidized.
Titulo: Improvement of Oxidation Resistance of Fe-Cr Ferritic Alloy Sheets for SOFC Interconnects

Sentencas: Such accelerated oxidation was improved mainly by reducing Mn, additionally by increasing Cr and adding W.
Titulo: Improvement of Oxidation Resistance of Fe-Cr Ferritic Alloy Sheets for SOFC Interconnects
